room_title: Escape room "Escape the Beast" by Escape-topia in Miami
room_description: You find yourselves in a hotel room, the air is old and stale. The staff doesn't dare to keep it up. There is something in here: ancient and hungry... and it's coming. You can hear it behind the peeling wallpaper, the heartbeat... the clock is ticking. Escape before it devours your souls!
